content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal
- Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) for transferring coal
- Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5) for storing coal
- Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) 
- Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest is not empty before attempting to extract items
- Make sure to specify the correct chest entity when extracting items
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
- Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full to continue mining
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate
- Make sure the inserter has source items to pick up
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity contains the item being extracted
- Ensure the correct quantity is specified when extracting items
